Name: Burger King

Name: Burger King
Review Text:
Pros: Cheap nuggets, alright milkshake
Cons: The cheap nuggets tasted very cheap. Burger King food is in general pretty meh

Name: Burger King
Review Text: Well, it's a Burger King in a tourist area, where people get high and drunk. Dirty bathrooms, decorated with the casual drug paraphernalia, and the food is not worse or better than in any other big fast food chain. I remembered afterwards why I haven't been to BK or McD for a very long time. 2 stars just for the friendly staff

Name: Burger King
Review Text: The place is relatively clean, the apartments cost 0.50 euros, but if you put in 20 + 20 + 10, it is not written that it is impossible and then no refund. You add another 0.50 in one currency to enter the bathroom, even if you eat there ...

Name: Burger King
Review Text: Again as with a lot of Amsterdam‚Äôs fast food restaurants the problem with ordering food then unable to find a seat. Service is fast but burgers are cold ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. The standing area at the front is often the only place to eat your burger. The toilets certainly need some attention.

Name: Burger King
Review Text: It's a Burger king. You need 50cents for the toilet but you can order extra burgers in a meal. With plenty of great places to eat nearby I would dodge it and go elsewhere

Name: Burger King
Review Text: european menu is always better than the UK options...even the mayo tastes  different..sweeter..better...friendly staff...only thing is this having to pay to use the toilet even though u are already a paying  customer but this seems to be the custom throughout Europe and seems to be a good incentive for people to keep them clean

Name: Burger King
Review Text: Coming from America and having burger King in Europe, it's always fresh, clean establishment, and efficient with the food ordering and presentation. I always enjoy having McDonald's or a burger kind in Europe. Delicious.

Name: Burger King
Review Text: A bit slow but ok for a quick bite to eat

Name: Burger King
